name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Deep Links and QR Codes - Linkapply

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Deep Link and QR Code Generator

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create short, powerful deep links and QR Codes and share them with the world.

Connect with your audience and drive more viewers to your content with Linkapply’s powerful connection platform. Create deep links and QR Codes right from any page.

Create deep links with one click

Click the Linkapply button in your toolbar to create a unique deep link to the current URL. Your deep link is ready to paste into a post, message, or document. You can see the total number of links, clicks and unique clicks in your Linkapply dashboard.

Generate QR Codes

Create QR codes for print, outdoor, and other ad campaigns. With Linkapply, a static QR Code will never get stale—just redirect it when your content changes.
